item.title: Reboot
item.description: I spent most of my career writing code - mostly Ruby on Rails and Objective-C, and in the last few years I’ve been mostly in Engineering Management, which means writing less code and managing people and strategy more. But thanks to extra time and headspace introduced by COVID-19 related #StayHome social distancing and lockdown measures (aka Circuit Breaker if you’re in ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡¬), I’ve taken the opportunity to bring myself up to date and rekindle my relationship with writing and deploying code.
